text: @realDonaldTrump (Continue.#7)if I did not watch this problem several years ago,I was not able to calculate the true criminal of the present coronavirus.And they held OLYMPIC hostage and was able to set terrorism of the coronavirus because Japan told this lie.this is a evidence.please,be careful.
